TEACHING

During my doctoral research. I instructed various Python programming courses and developed my own learning resources for Python-beginners. Check out this repository for an extensive collection.

    University of Konstanz, Winter 2022/23
     Linguistic Gaming with Python (Bachelor seminar taught as sole instructor)
    Zurich University of Applied Sciences (ZHAW), March 3-4, 2022
     Python for Linguists (PhD workshop taught as sole instructor; content developed from scratch)
    University of Konstanz, Winter 2021/22
     Linguistic Gaming with Python (Bachelor seminar co-taught with Prof. Miriam Butt)
    University of Konstanz, Winter 2018/19
     Tutorial of Pragmatics I (Bachelor seminar; main lecture taught by Dr. Manfred Kupffer)
